snippet.title: Panther VR Stealth Action: Announcement Trailer (Rift, Vive, Index)
snippet.description:
From the Studio behind Skyworld and VR Dungeon Knight comes the Ultimate Stealth-Action for VR to Kickstarter and Early Access.

Plan out your heist, choose your weapons and gadgets and infiltrate the location. Go full stealth or guns blazing, level up, get rich and expand your personal hideout with powerfull weapons, gadgets, and collectibles. Remember Agent, Everything can be stolen.

Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/wolfdogint/panther-vr
Website: http://www.panther-game.com/

For all the best in AR and VR News: http://www.uploadvr.com

Follow us for up-to-the-minute updates:

🎦Twitch: https://twitch.tv/UploadVR
⌨️ Discord: https://discord.gg/VNA7fWd
📘  Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/uploadvr/
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/UploadVR
#VR
